name: Wii BRMDL Model File
summary: Learn about .BRMDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: There may be one or multiple RMDL files for a single character.
NOTE: BRMDL files can be renamed with the "brres" extension and opened as a BRRES file.

description: Wii game model file used by select Nintendo Wii games such as Super Smash Bros. Brawl; saved in the BRMDL format, which is similar to the .BRRES package format; contains model data used to make up the appearance of characters.
